name: dodge gun
description:
made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2

this is a game where bullets dont go away because instead once they are shot the bounce of the walls and can hurt you. but once you kill all the enemies you must survive the after time which you can see in the corner to finish the level (also bullets turn purple when hitting enemies and do not hurt them after that but all bullets hurt you)

made by malek elsady
sound by Ibrahim12344321
